reviews.review: this film is so funny I wwnt to see it twice once with my mum then with my friends because it made me lol. I enjoyed loads both times. Some things are random but still funny. My fave character is thumbs up.
Mildly entertaining to parents, but the kids enjoyed it. It is a shame: Cast is loaded with talent. Don't be fooled, though.

You know when you want to watch a YouTube video, but you get a 30 second unskipable ad? Well, this movie is like an 80 minute version of those ads, except unlike those ads, the emoji movie is never at any point interesting. In addition, the movie was so cringy I got up to go to the bathroom, not because I needed to, but because Ineeded a break from this  terrible "film" I don't even want to call it a film really, it's just a bunch of app ads.
stupid movie. kids giggle a little bit but not much to it. pixar movies are really going downhill. They try too hard for a laugh now a days

I dont know what to say about this movie. considering the fact they had put much effort on this production, it was such a disappointment. It was full of indirect advertisements in terms of emojis. badly done.
I HATE THIS MOVIE.THIS MOVIE IS THE WORST KIDS MOVIE EVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! It has nothing original its boring and its not entertaining.

The best movie I have ever watched. It was a priveledge to even lay eyes on. The cast was full of amazing actors such as patrick stewert who played the poop emoji beautifuly. All in all this was a 5/5 cinimatic masterpiece.

After watching this horrible pile of anus poo I had lost faith in the entertainment industry. The ?film? was basically a f*** fest of ads for a verity of apps and programs. Further more the film demonstrates the exact opposite of individuality (which is the films exact ?message?) by displaying ads. As a comedy animation for children one would expect so funny jokes. But instead the Emoji Movie spits out forced puns that most children wouldn't get.

So to conclude this review I would say that this film isn?t even worth watching ironically. I hope all who contributed to the movie feel ashamed at what they have done 
I rate 0.5/5 stars
??I Thought The Emoji Was gr8 I Love It. I Thought It Was Fucken Amazing??
This is the best movie I've ever seen
